mil5.1.10:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil5.1.10:1.10_0: the word of the Buddhas, the word ‘nowledge’, the word’.
mil5.1.10:1.11_0: This bag of bones is deep, profound, transcended; a deep foundations, a chatting, or obliging in such a way; and that he consents to someone else. He then breaking out of the work.”
mil5.1.10:1.1_0: “When the Buddha spoke like this, he said,
mil5.1.10:1.2_0: ‘The Realized One has developed and cultivated the four bases of psychic power, made them a vehicle and a basis, kept them up, consolidated them, and properly implemented them. If he wished, the Realized One could live on for the eon or what’s left of it.’
mil5.1.10:1.3_0: And he had spoken to him.
mil5.1.10:1.4_0: ‘When three months have passed, the Realized One will be extinguished.
mil5.1.10:1.5_0: And he told him about this.
mil5.1.10:1.6_1: Because they haven’t made a residue.’
mil5.1.10:1.7_0: And he told them what had happened.
mil5.1.10:1.8_0: when three months have passed, the Realized One became fully extinguished.
mil5.1.10:2.1_0: “Great king, these four bases of psychic power have been developed and cultivated by the Buddha ...
mil5.1.10:2.1_1: And they are said to be cleared, ‘Raffected’.
mil5.1.10:2.2_0: But you don’t tell the Buddha if he was the power of himself, then the Buddha when he replied,
mil5.1.10:2.3_0: ‘The four bases of psychic power have been developed and cultivated there’s a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.’
mil5.1.10:3.10_0: “It’s good, Sir, that you should repeat what I have said.”
mil5.1.10:3.1_0: And when he came to the king, he would be fastened to the kingship for his son, when he was fastened, ... the royal banyan tree gives him a speed. He’d a counselor, an irrigation gutter for the well.
mil5.1.10:3.2_0: In the same way, the Buddha is able to satisfy his own insighter of the three knowledges. He sits down to understand the priest of the perfected ones, the fully awakened Buddhas of the gods and humans.
mil5.1.10:3.3_0: ‘The Realized One has developed and cultivated the four bases of psychic power, made them a vehicle and a basis, kept them up, consolidated them, and properly implemented them. If he wished, the Realized One could live on for the eon or what’s left of it.’
mil5.1.10:3.4_0: But great king, that he is able to stop the Buddha with psychic power. And it’s possible for a residue of the eon, the ascetic Gotama. No matter what it’s left of all eon, his psychic power.
mil5.1.10:3.5_0: I have been spoken by the Buddha, great king, and
mil5.1.10:3.6_0: ‘Just as, mendicants, even a tiny bit of fecal matter still stinks,
mil5.1.10:3.7_0: In the same way, as even a small thing, not even a bit of dirt under your fingernail, or even if I see it they’ve seen with psychic power, will that the Buddha is performed desire and lust for continued existence.”
mil5.1.10:3.9_0: “Well then, great king, harness the Buddha supernormal powers of the Buddha, give him such power.”
mil5.1.10:4.1_0: he has psychic powers, and is the ten powers.
mil5.1.10:5.1_0: The first sub-chapter on psychic power is finished.
mil5.1.10:6.1_0: and the ten questions on this exposition of the teaching.
